body_html:
gunan@ is our bazel version check not working again?

@srvoin If the check is working properly, it should tell you something like "you need at least bazel X.X.X".

I think otherwise this is an unfortunate one-off, since the 0.5.3 bazel release was broken.

Leaving open only to check whether our check works.

body:
gunan@ is our bazel version check not working again? 

@srvoin If the check is working properly, it should tell you something like "you need at least bazel X.X.X".

I think otherwise this is an unfortunate one-off, since the 0.5.3 bazel release was broken.

Leaving open only to check whether our check works.
